contentrichtext.text: {{Primary sources|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox musical artist |name = Jari Kainulainen |image = Evergrey Nosturi 20032008 Kainulainen 01.jpg |caption = Jari Kainulainen with Evergrey live in [[Nosturi]], 2008 |background = non_vocal_instrumentalist |birth_name = |alias = |birth_date = {{birth date and age|1970|4|29|df=y}} |death_date = |origin = [[Helsinki]], [[Finland]] |instrument = [[Bass guitar|Bass]] |genre = [[Neo-classical metal]], [[power metal]], [[progressive metal]] |occupation = |years_active = 1993â€“present |label = |associated_acts = [[Stratovarius]], [[Symfonia]], [[Killing Machine (band)|Killing Machine]], [[Evergrey]], Mess, [[Elias Viljanen|E.Vil]], [[Kotipelto]], [[Masterplan (band)|Masterplan]] }} '''Jari Kainulainen''' is a Finnish bassist best known as the former bassist of Finnish power metal band [[Stratovarius]] from 1993 until 2005. He has also played with other bands such as [[Symfonia]], [[Evergrey]], and Devil's Train. Kainulainen plays Ibanez 6 string basses and uses [[Ampeg]] amplifiers. He is influenced by [[Geezer Butler]], [[Billy Sheehan]], [[Cliff Burton]], and [[Steve Harris (musician)|Steve Harris]].<ref name="myspace">{{cite web|author=NO |url=http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=105640267 |title=Jari Kainulainen | Gratis muziek, tourneedata, foto's, video's |publisher=Profile.myspace.com |date= |accessdate=2011-07-15}}</ref> He joined [[Masterplan (band)|Masterplan]] in 2012. ===Stratovarius=== *1994: ''[[Dreamspace]]'' *1995: ''[[Fourth Dimension (Stratovarius album)|Fourth Dimension]]'' *1996: ''[[Episode (Stratovarius album)|Episode]]'' *1997: ''[[Visions (Stratovarius album)|Visions]]'' *1997: ''[[The Past and Now]]'' (compilation) *1998: ''[[Visions of Europe]]'' (live) *1998: ''[[Destiny (Stratovarius album)|Destiny]]'' *1999: ''[[The Chosen Ones]]'' (compilation) *2000: ''[[Infinite (Stratovarius album)|Infinite]]'' *2000: ''[[14 Diamonds]]'' (compilation) *2000: ''[[Infinite Visions]]'' (DVD) *2001: ''[[Intermission (Stratovarius album)|Intermission]]'' *2003: ''[[Elements, Pt. 1]]'' *2003: ''[[Elements, Pt. 2]]'' *2005: ''[[Stratovarius (album)|Stratovarius]]'' ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons|Jari Kainulainen|Jari Kainulainen}} *[http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=105640267 Kainulainen's MySpace] {{Masterplan}} {{Evergrey}} {{Stratovarius}} {{Elias Viljanen}} {{Authority control|VIAF=85858850}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kainulainen, Jari | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 1970-04-29 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kainulainen, Jari}} [[Category:1970 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Finnish heavy metal bass guitarists]] [[Category:Stratovarius members]] {{bass-guitarist-stub}}
